description: A key piece in the VentureLayer Series, this highly packable 200-weight long-sleeve features the classic functionality of a baselayer, but added versatility and style for everyday wear. A sustainable Modal/Merino Wool blend provides natural odor control to keep things fresh plus inherent thermoregulating technology, moisture wicking, and quick dry performance. It’s meant to be layered with the entire series, but can also be worn on its own for outdoor adventures or casual wear. As with every VentureLayer piece, this style is engineered to pack into its own pocket for easy storage.
name: Royal Robbins Venturelayer 200 LS - Mens
